org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders

Class ImageTranscoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders.TranscoderBase

        • org.apache.flex.compiler.internal.embedding.transcoders.ImageTranscoder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JPEGTranscoder

    public class ImageTranscoder
extends ScalableTranscoder
    Handle the embedding of images which don't need to be transcoded
